text: The Green Revolution, w/ HYVs & Haber-Bosch fertilizers, averted famine but led to soil degradation & pollution in India. Avg Soil Organic Carbon <0.3%, far below expert-recommended 1%. Restoring soil is an ecological & economic imperative! 🌱 #SoilHealth #AgriTech #India

text:
Chinese drone maker DJI is appealing a US court ruling that upheld its designation as a “Chinese military company” under the 1260H list. The label blocks federal contracts and poses reputational risks, though DJI claims financial and business harm.
